head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOHR, HON. DONALD F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOHR, HON. DONALD F.

block.p: MOHR--Hon. Donald F., former Family Court Judge, beloved husband of Barbara, devoted father of Martin and Alison, dear brother of Harriet Schutzer and loving grandfather. Services Monday, 11:30am at Weinstein Memorial Chapel, 1652 Central Park Ave., Yonkers, NY. $(6$)MOHR--Donald. We mourn the passing of our dear friend and classmate ''Reds'' Mohr, he was one of our best. Phi Sigma Delta, Class of 1955 , Union College
